properties.title: Maven: the cute and fully build tool.
properties.author: Jason van Zyl

section.name: Maven: the cute and fluffy build tool that's good for the whole family
section.p: Maven will make you laugh; Maven will make you jump for joy; Maven will make you put that dirty little tool called Ant in the litter box with the cat treats where it belongs!

subsection.name: Say Goodbye the build time stains!
subsection.p: Maven helps you get rid of those hard to get rid of build stains. Wash with Maven and go!
